languages.text: Пока гвардейцы верили, что остались одни посреди ужасов вселенной, они сражались без сомнений. Но ваши слова заронили в них робкую надежду на лучшее — и она их погубит.

While the Guardsmen believed they were alone amidst the horrors of the universe, they fought without doubt. But your words have given them a glimmer of hope of better things to come, and it will destroy them.
languages.original_text: Пока гвардейцы верили, что остались одни посреди ужасов вселенной, они сражались без сомнений. Но ваши слова заронили в них робкую надежду на лучшее — и она их погубит.

While the Guardsmen believed they were alone amidst the horrors of the universe, they fought without doubt. But your words have given them a glimmer of hope of better things to come, and it will destroy them.

languages.text: ガーズマンたちが宇宙の恐怖の中で孤独だと信じている間は、疑いなく戦った。だが、あなたの言葉が彼らに希望の光を与えてしまった。そして、それは彼らを破滅へと導く。
languages.original_text: While the Guardsmen believed they were alone amidst the horrors of the universe, they fought without doubt. But your words have given them a glimmer of hope of better things to come, and it will destroy them.

traits.locale_text: ガーズマンたちが宇宙の恐怖の中で孤独だと信じている間は、疑いなく戦った。だが、あなたの言葉が彼らに希望の光を与えてしまった。そして、それは彼らを破滅へと導く。

languages.text: Solange die Soldaten glaubten, sie stünden alleine gegen die Schrecken des Universums, kämpften sie ohne Zweifel. Aber deine Worte haben ihnen einen Hoffnungsschimmer auf bessere Zeiten gegeben, und das wird sie vernichten.
languages.original_text: While the Guardsmen believed they were alone amidst the horrors of the universe, they fought without doubt. But your words have given them a glimmer of hope of better things to come, and it will destroy them.

traits.locale_text: Solange die Soldaten glaubten, sie stünden alleine gegen die Schrecken des Universums, kämpften sie ohne Zweifel. Aber deine Worte haben ihnen einen Hoffnungsschimmer auf bessere Zeiten gegeben, und das wird sie vernichten.

languages.text: Evrenin dehşetleri arasında yalnız kaldıklarını sanan Muhafızlar, tereddüt etmeden savaşmışlardı. Fakat sözlerin onlara gelecek için ufacık da olsa bir umut kıvılcımı verdi ve tam da o kıvılcım, nihayetinde onları mahvedecek.
languages.original_text: While the Guardsmen believed they were alone amidst the horrors of the universe, they fought without doubt. But your words have given them a glimmer of hope of better things to come, and it will destroy them.

traits.locale_text: Evrenin dehşetleri arasında yalnız kaldıklarını sanan Muhafızlar, tereddüt etmeden savaşmışlardı. Fakat sözlerin onlara gelecek için ufacık da olsa bir umut kıvılcımı verdi ve tam da o kıvılcım, nihayetinde onları mahvedecek.

languages.text: Cuando los guardias creían que estaban solos ante los horrores del universo, lucharon sin dudar. Pero tus palabras les han dado esperanzas de un mañana mejor, y eso acabará con ellos.
languages.original_text: While the Guardsmen believed they were alone amidst the horrors of the universe, they fought without doubt. But your words have given them a glimmer of hope of better things to come, and it will destroy them.

traits.locale_text: Cuando los guardias creían que estaban solos ante los horrores del universo, lucharon sin dudar. Pero tus palabras les han dado esperanzas de un mañana mejor, y eso acabará con ellos.

languages.text: 这些士兵原以为自己孤立无援，不得不独自面对宇宙中的恐怖之物，因此也会毫不迟疑地勇敢战斗。不过，你的话给他们带来了美好的希望，也摧毁了他们的斗志。
languages.original_text: While the Guardsmen believed they were alone amidst the horrors of the universe, they fought without doubt. But your words have given them a glimmer of hope of better things to come, and it will destroy them.

traits.locale_text: 这些士兵原以为自己孤立无援，不得不独自面对宇宙中的恐怖之物，因此也会毫不迟疑地勇敢战斗。不过，你的话给他们带来了美好的希望，也摧毁了他们的斗志。

languages.text: Tant que les gardes pensaient être les seuls à lutter contre les horreurs de l'univers, ils combattaient sans laisser place au moindre doute. Mais vos paroles ont fait naître en eux une lueur d'espoir pour leur avenir, ce qui les détruira.
languages.original_text: While the Guardsmen believed they were alone amidst the horrors of the universe, they fought without doubt. But your words have given them a glimmer of hope of better things to come, and it will destroy them.

traits.locale_text: Tant que les gardes pensaient être les seuls à lutter contre les horreurs de l'univers, ils combattaient sans laisser place au moindre doute. Mais vos paroles ont fait naître en eux une lueur d'espoir pour leur avenir, ce qui les détruira.
